Deepdark Strike.name: Deepdark Strike
Deepdark Strike.flavor: Your weapon is wreathed in an impenetrable blackness, which darkens your enemyâ€™s eyes when you strike.
Deepdark Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Form of the Umber Hulk.name: Form of the Umber Hulk
Form of the Umber Hulk.flavor: Your eyes take on an insectlike appearance, you sprout antennae from atop your head, and a pair of sharp mandibles grows out from your mouth. At the moment you choose, you can gaze upon your enemies and sow confusion in their ranks.
Form of the Umber Hulk.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the umber hulk. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Fortitude defense. In addition, you also gain tremorsense 5 and a burrow speed of 2.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Umber Hulk Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Umber Hulk.onHit: Target slides 1 square and is dazed (save ends).
Form of the Umber Hulk.requirement: The power Form of the Umber Hulk must be active in order to use this power.

Cursefire Light.name: Cursefire Light
Cursefire Light.flavor: Your body is ablaze in an eerie green flame that feeds off your curses, bolstering you.
Cursefire Light.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever an enemy cursed by you hits you with an attack, you can choose to gain 5 temporary hit points or make a saving throw.
